thread.title: M1 Catthorpe interchange reopens after viaduct rehaul
thread.title_full: M1 Catthorpe interchange reopens after viaduct rehaul | Central - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: M1 Catthorpe interchange reopens after viaduct rehaul
text:
The Catthorpe Interchange viaduct as it used to look before its dramatic demolition Credit: ITV News Central The new southbound link to the M1 at the Catthorpe interchange will open later.
It's the first completed part of the 191 million pound improvement to junction 19 It is the first key step to improving journeys for the 142,000 vehicles that pass through the junction every day.
The 250 metre viaduct - the first completed section of the scheme - will open overnight tonight so it can be used during rush hour tomorrow.
Read more: 500 explosives demolish old bridge over M1
Last updated Tue 22 Sep 2015 Travel east midlands
